DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study Phase IV , single center , placebo-controlled , parallel study design conduct use Environmental Exposure Unit ( EEU ) . The study aim determine whether benefit Grastek® treatment birch-pollen induce allergic rhinoconjunctivitis . Grastek® Health Canada FDA approve sublingual immunotherapy ( SLIT ) treatment grass-pollen induced allergic rhinoconjunctivitis . The EEU provide close environment participant expose predetermine , control , constant level airborne pollen . 96 participant complete study either receive Grastek® placebo 1:1 ratio . The study consist screen visit , pre-treatment pollen exposure visit , 60 day treatment Grastek® placebo , two treatment visit follow-up pollen exposure visit .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Grass SLIT Treatment Birch Pollen Induced Allergic Rhinitis - Pilot Evaluation

Acceptable method birth control study include : oral , patch , intravaginal hormonal contraceptive Norplant System® DepoProvera® IUD double barrier method abstinence surgically sterile female ( hysterectomy tubal ligation ) > 1 year postmenopausal females sex partner partner vasectomy ( > 3 month ) 7 . Female participant pregnant lactating . 3 . Has history illness , opinion study investigator , might confound result study pose additional risk participant participation study . This include clinically relevant medical surgical history presence respiratory disease ( exception make asthma allergic rhinitis define exclusion criterion ) , gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , hematological , lymphatic , neurological , cardiovascular , psychiatric , musculoskeletal , immunological , dermatological , connective tissue diseases disorder , history malignancy within past 5 year , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer . 4 . Has significant abnormality find physical exam determine investigator . 5 . Has current medical history significant pulmonary disease and/or active asthma require daily drug therapy . Mild , intermittent asthma permit ( manage short act betaagonist le 3 time per week ) . Isolated exerciseinduced bronchospasm also permit . 6 . Has significant nasal polyp , nasal septal perforation , nasal tract malformation note physical exam . 9 . Administration adrenaline ( epinephrine ) contraindicate ( e.g . participant acute chronic symptomatic coronary heart disease concomitant betablocker therapy ) . 10 .
